title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify and document project requirements from stakeholders, including user stories, functional requirements, and non-functional requirements.

title: BCI Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the BCI system, ensuring it is intuitive and easy to use.

title: BCI System Architecture Design
description: Design the architecture for the BCI system, including hardware, software, and network requirements.

title: BCI Algorithm Development
description: Develop algorithms for interpreting and refining search queries based on user's thoughts.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing and querying search data.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the system, test the overall functionality, and fix any issues that arise.

title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Test the system with real users to ensure it meets their needs and expectations.

title: Deployment and Launch
description: Prepare for and execute the deployment of the system, including setting up infrastructure, configuring the system, and launching it.
